column4: ive often seen optical disk issues.  Seems either the media is getting really cheap and flakey these days, or the drives are getting cheaper and less reliable.. or both. :()
I tend to generate a bootable USB flash and install from that. Seems Much more reliable. and faster
Yes that is what
those are 'consoles'
How to open gtk/ot applications from tty1?
&Qt
type its name...   .. but you mean from the alt-ctrl F1 CONSOLE? and have it run on your X destop? You may need to
export DISPLAY=:0.0   first
No i mean when one uses recovery mode from boot, tty1 opens
From tty1 i was trying to open network tools
you have X going? if not.. then you are not going to 'see' a X gui app from the consoel..
Well tty1 are consoles right?
You have 7 consoles by default,. alt-ctrl-f1 through F7, X normally runs on 'f7' yes.
Ok.. I'll see. Thanks
Hey! Thats fine. I was thinking if there is a possiblilty to gui applications from console.(Bringing mouse in console to begin with) :)
Is that what you were looking for?
i just dident want to flood the channel more. :) i use the app every so often.
Ok:)
Huh? accept what file?
most irc clients have 'dcc' commands to send files. I never use the feature.
pastebin is much easier to use
Have you tried openDNS?
